com.mapzen.android.core

Class MapzenManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapzen.android.core.MapzenManager

  • public class MapzenManager
extends java.lang.Object
    MapzenManager assists with Mapzen API key management. When created it reads the API key set in string resources if one has been declared by the application. 
     <resources>
   <string name="mapzen_api_key">[YOUR_MAPZEN_API_KEY]</string>
 </resources>
    If an API key is set in code via setApiKey(String) it will override the declared as a string resource. Finally, if an API key is explicitly passed into a specific component when created it will supersede any key stored by this class. 
       MapzenSearch mapzenSearch = new MapzenSearch(context, "mapzen-XXXXXXX")

    • Method Detail

      • instance

        public static MapzenManager instance(android.content.Context context)

      • getApiKey

        public java.lang.String getApiKey()
        Returns the currently active API key stored by this class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a valid API key has not been set in code or as a string resource.

      • setApiKey

        public void setApiKey(java.lang.String apiKey)
        Sets a new API key value. This will override any previous key including those declared in xml.
